newsitem.title: UK: SocGen names global head of fund manager relations.
newsitem.headline: SocGen names global head of fund manager relations.

text.p: Societe Generale said Thursday it had appointed Steven Bobasch to the new position of global head of fund manager relationships within its global institutional investors division.
Bobasch will also be deputy head of the division, which includes regulated and unregulated funds as well as insurance companies.
He will be based in London and charged with ensuring that fund managers receive the attention of product specialists as well as senior management, Societe Generale said.
Bobasch was previously an executive director in Societe Generale's UK credit division. London Newsroom +171 542 2734
